db_user.description: Database User, default is 'user'. This parameter is set only if database is not created yet.
db_user.title: Database User

db_password.description: Database password. If no password set, a password will be generated. This parameter is set only if database is not created yet.
db_password.title: Initial database password

db_charset.description: Database Character set information. This parameter is set only if database is not created yet.
db_charset.title: Database Character set information
